<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><before>false</before><description/><flush_cache>false</flush_cache><name>GFMS temp</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('x_g_irm_fms_gfms_staged_data');
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        gr.autoSysFields(false); // avoid "updated" and "updated_by" changes
        gr.setWorkflow(false);
        gr.setValue('sys_updated_on', new GlideDateTime());
        gr.update();
    }
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MarkelJR@state.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-16 17:26:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>7ea7c54d1b4a74100a4a10ad9c4bcbcd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GFMS temp</sys_name><sys_package display_value="FMS" source="x_g_irm_fms">c728dd331b3fc8100a4a10ad9c4bcbb6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="FMS">c728dd331b3fc8100a4a10ad9c4bcbb6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_7ea7c54d1b4a74100a4a10ad9c4bcbcd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MarkelJR@state.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-16 17:26:23</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
